dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset of 64x64 binarised images containing each a single shape, with generative factors including shape, position, scale, and rotation. The dataset consists of 267,021 images, separated into training, validation, and test sets.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Lecun
L. Bottou
Y. Bengio
P. Haffner
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is a well-known benchmark dataset for handwritten digit classification, consisting of 70,000 images of handwritten digits (0-9) in grayscale.
dcterms:title: MNIST Dataset
